actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional income tax exemption for a taxpayer, his spouse, or his dependent, who is disabled.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an additional personal exemption and withholding exemption for a taxpayer, a spouse, or a dependent who is disabled.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional income tax exemption for a taxpayer, his spouse, or his dependent, who is disabled.
